item.title: Can someone give me the dark bow spec codes please?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

[quote=“Jonnydpickle, post:6, topic:337167”][quote author=wiz1166 link=topic=433577.msg3183648#msg3183648 date=1271536499]
Go to client hacking and model request section…
[/quote]
Ok lets be honest kid…
You have no room to be calling him a kid atleast he can (i hope he can)
write up a simple dark bow spec code.[/quote]What?
Are you talking to me or him?
He didn’t call anyone a kid, but he didn’t create a dark bow spec either.

item.title: Can someone give me the dark bow spec codes please?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

wiz1166:

Go to client hacking and model request section…

Spec codes = model?
I think not kid.

This is mine…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74){ specialAtk(true, 75, 549, 426); hitDiff *= 1.5; int offsetX = (absY - EnemyY) * -1; int offsetY = (absX - EnemyX) * -1; createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 85, 643, 43, 31, AttackingOn+1); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 70, 643, 43, 31, AttackingOn+1); }

However, I don’t use it, and if I recall, it crashed my client.
But client is a piece of shit anyways.
Let me know if it works for you.

Read full topic
